meta.title: Privacy Policy
meta.description: Learn how Starion Digital protects your personal data on our augmented reality souvenir website.

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.introduction: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.description: We may collect the following categories of data:
dataCollection.cookies: Cookies to save language and theme preferences.
dataCollection.usageData: Anonymous website usage data (e.g., pages visited).
dataCollection.contactData: Data you voluntarily provide when contacting us (name, email).

dataUsage.title: Data Usage
dataUsage.description: Data is used to operate the website, personalize, and improve service quality.

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.description: We do not share your data with third parties, except as required by law.

dataStorage.title: Data Storage
dataStorage.description: Cookies are stored for 1 day to 12 months. Contact data is kept only for the duration of processing your request.

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.description: You have the right to request a copy of your data, request corrections or deletion, and opt out of cookies.

changes.title: Changes
changes.description: We may update this policy. All changes will be posted here.

meta.title: Terms of Use
meta.description: Review the terms governing the use of Starion Digital’s augmented reality souvenir website.

Terms.title: Terms of Use
Terms.introduction: By using this website, you agree to the terms below.

useOfSite.title: Use of the Site
useOfSite.description: The site is provided 'as is.' Use it only for lawful purposes.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.description: All materials (logos, designs, texts, images, 3D models) belong to Starion Digital and are protected by copyright.

prohibited.title: Prohibited Actions
prohibited.illegal: using the site for illegal activities;
prohibited.spam: sending spam or attempting to hack;
prohibited.copy: copying or modifying site content without permission.

limitations.title: Limitation of Liability
limitations.description: We are not liable for damages caused by site use and do not guarantee uninterrupted operation.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.description: These terms are governed by the laws of the Republic of Moldova / EU.

changes.title: Changes
changes.description: Terms may be updated. The new version will be posted on this page.

CookieBanner.message: We use cookies to enhance your experience. By continuing, you agree to our policy.

NotFound.title: Page Not Found
NotFound.description: Oops! The page you're looking for doesn't exist. Let's get you back to exploring our augmented reality souvenirs!
